inspectionItems.name: Product Quality
inspectionItems.description: Inspection of the product's quality and adherence to specifications.

inspectionItems.name: Packaging Integrity
inspectionItems.description: Inspection of the product's packaging for damage or defects.
inspectionCriteria: Check for proper labeling and markings

inspectionItems.name: Documentation Review
inspectionItems.description: Review of the product's documentation for completeness and accuracy.
inspectionCriteria: Check for user manual and warranty information
Ensure documentation is clear and easy to understand
inspectionResults: User manual and warranty information present
Documentation is clear and easy to understand

report.comments: Overall, the product meets all quality standards and is ready for shipment.
